title.narrative: Urban Environment and Climate Change Adaptation Project

description.narrative: The proposed project will construct and upgrade the infrastructure facilities to improve urban environmental conditions in three coastal cities of Dong Hoi (Quang Binh province), Hoi An (Quang Nam province), and Sam Son (Thanh Hoa province). The improved urban environment is expected to strengthen the municipal financial bases in the project cities through an increase of tax revenues from the appreciation of land values and the tourism industry.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Greater access to improved urban services in Dong Hoi and Hoi An.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
d. Hoi An: Damage from coastal flooding reduced by $2 million per year (2009-2013 average: $2.5 million) benefiting 15,600 urban households

description.narrative: Greater access to improved urban services in Dong Hoi and Hoi An.

title.narrative: c. Hoi An: 5km of Co Co river dredged, serving at least 2,000 households

description.narrative: Greater access to improved urban services in Dong Hoi and Hoi An.

title.narrative: a. Dong Hoi: New urban area in Bao Ninh peninsula developed, serving 2,900 new households

description.narrative: Greater access to improved urban services in Dong Hoi and Hoi An.

title.narrative: e. Hoi An: Cost over revenue ratio of water supply improved to 0.6 (2014 baseline: 0.9)

description.narrative: Greater access to improved urban services in Dong Hoi and Hoi An.

title.narrative: b. Dong Hoi: Number of households served by new and improved wastewater collection and treatment increased to 7,000 (2014 baseline: 1,700)
